page.description: Parse the SQLStatement passed (or the value previously set into the SQLStatement property).
page.original:
SQL::Query::Join::Parse() Syntax .Parse( [ SQL as C ] ) Argument Description A SQL::Query::Join object created with a DIM statement. SQL A SQL statement.
Description The Parse() method accepts an optional text string and parses it. If the parse is successful, the elements of the SQL statement will be available immediately as properties of the object. Examples
See Also SQL::Query Object Limitations
